text:
As punishment for being rude to Yuika,
P-tan, please find a nice-looking fruit.

Hmm, that's tough...!?
Something like a small stone──

Sigh... If P-tan doesn't find a nice fruit soon, I won't be
able to focus on work because of the snow rabbit.

(Even saying that,
I know it's a hassle for them...)

──How about this? On the way to the set, we'll hold auditions
for fruits suitable for the snow rabbit's eyes, how's that?
